update pgl_product_duty
policy_no = #{policyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
policy_grade_level_no = #{policyGradeLevelNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
duty_id = #{dutyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pglp_duty_prem = #{pglpDutyPrem,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pglp_duty_covrage = #{pglpDutyCovrage,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
subsidy_amount = #{subsidyAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
deductible_days = #{deductibleDays,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pglp_duty_waiting_period = #{pglpDutyWaitingPeriod,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pglp_duty_deductibles = #{pglpDutyDeductibles,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pglp_duty_times_deductibles = #{pglpDutyTimesDeductibles,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pglp_duty_lifelong_deductibles = #{pglpDutyLifelongDeductibles,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pglp_duty_times_type = #{pglpDutyTimesType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pglp_duty_times = #{pglpDutyTimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pglp_duty_times_day = #{pglpDutyTimesDay,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pglp_duty_total_days = #{pglpDutyTotalDays,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pglp_duty_special_contract = #{pglpDutySpecialContract,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pglp_duty_times_amonut = #{pglpDutyTimesAmonut,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where pgl_product_duty_id = #{pglProductDutyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
